sentence: Pence and 2024: Mike Pence says he could run for president in 2024 even if Trump also runs Tuesday contests:Georgia, Alabama, Texas and more: the primary races to watch on Tuesday (and why) "I'm here because Brian Kemp is the only candidate in tomorrow's primary who has already defeated Stacey Abrams whether she knows it or not," said Pence.
author: David Jackson
title: In Georgia, the Brian Kemp-David Perdue primary has turned into a Donald Trump-Mike Pence feud
